jcr:content.jcr:title: G533 - Carmen
jcr:content.searchTitle: G533 Wireless DTS 7.1 Surround Gaming Headset
jcr:content.seoDescription: Logitech G533 wireless gaming headset with DTS 7.1 surround sound brings game audio to life with pro sound & 7 customizable audio channels.
jcr:content.seoPageTitle: Logitech G533 DTS 7.1 Surround Sound Wireless Gaming Headset - en-us

testimonial_copy.quotation: "The G533 is my new go-to recommendation."

copyblock.mainTitle: Logitech G G533 Wireless Gaming Headset

banner_copy_block.mainDescription: G603, with the revolutionary HERO sensor and LIGHTSPEED wireless technology, lets you play without wires—without limits. Enhanced with 10x sensor efficiency, this is a breakthrough in battery life and the new standard in wireless gaming.

bannercopyblock.mainDescription: G533 is a fully-featured, pro-grade gaming headset composed with DTS Headphone:X for 7.1 surround sound, Pro-G™ audio drivers for booming audio without distortion and a 15-hour battery for an enduring and robust wireless connection.

copyblock.mainDescription: G533 accurately reflects the in-game environment in 7.1 channel virtual surround sound. Hear and detect your enemies, incoming threats, and loot all around you. Use Logitech Gaming Software (LGS) to tune the volume levels for each of the 7 audio channels. For example, you can amplify game sounds coming from rear channels to hear what’s behind you.

Hear your games loud and clear with the realism and precision that the sound designers intended. Pro-G drivers produce booming bass and clear highs thanks to the patent-pending hybrid-mesh construction that drastically reduces distortion.

G533 features lossless digital audio transmission over 2.4 GHz, delivering wireless convenience and incredible high fidelity sound with up to 15 meters range. G533 is thoroughly tested and designed to maintain a strong connection even in noisy EMI environments where there are dozens of wireless signals in proximity.

With the latest in materials and manufacturing techniques, G533 is designed to be a durable, yet lightweight headset that you can wear for hours. G533 has an over-the ear, lightweight design, which is comfortable for long gaming sessions. Sports mesh ear pads are designed to be breathable and can be removed for cleaning.

Rechargeable, replaceable batteries power G533 for marathon gaming sessions up to 15 hours, non-stop, on a single charge. Keep an eye on your charge level in Logitech Gaming Software so you don’t run out of juice in the middle of your game.Rechargeable batteries have a limited lifespan and a limited number of charge cycles.

G533 features a noise-cancelling microphone on a folding, extending boom for crystal-clear voice chat and communications. For added convenience, the microphone mutes automatically when you flip it into the up position. The headset also features configurable “sidetone” that lets you tune the volume of your own voice you hear in your headset. Now, you won’t unknowingly yell into your mic.

An easy-to-reach volume control roller and mic mute button on the left earcup makes it simple to adjust your audio settings on the fly. For fine tuned settings, Logitech Gaming Software lets you set equalizer, surround sound, sidetone, and microphone levels on a per-game basis. You can even reprogram the mute button and use as a G-key to many function, like “play/pause” to start/stop your media, or any complex macros.

list_information_480.text: * Rechargeable batteries have a limited lifespan and a limited number of charge cycles.

list_information_458_821141837.text: *7.1 Surround Sound only available on PC

_x0032_.text: Windows® 10, Windows 8.1, or Windows 7, Mac OS X 10.11 or later*

_x0033_.text: Internet access for Logitech Gaming Software and 7.1 DTS Headphone:X software installation*
